en.authentification_tip: Authentification failed. Have you set the API Key?
en.error_tip: Ooops, there is an error. Please check your source image and settings.
en.not_available_tip: TinyPNG API is currently not available.
en.network_error_tip: Network issue occurred. Please check your internet connectivity.
en.api_tip: TinyPNG: API validation failed. Be sure that you filled out tinypng.apiKey setting already.

zh.authentification_tip: 授权失败，请确定是否填写API key
zh.error_tip: 出错了, 请检查源图片文件和设置
